DOC.detailed_description: Women puerperium know T2DM GDM diagnose hospital invite participate study . Gestational diabetes diagnose 75-g oral glucose tolerance test . Weight ( kg ) height ( ) measure use mechanical column scale ( SECA ) . The specific dimension eat behavior measure 18-item Three-Factor Eating Questionnaire-18 ( TFEQ-18 ) . The Medical Nutrition Therapy ( MNT ) offer every 2-4 week . This therapy consist provide food plan follow recommendation : limit carbohydrate intake 35-45 % total calorie calculate 30 kcal/kg base pregestational BMI ideal weight . We evaluate effect MNT GWG use multiple linear regression model
